library(data.table)

```{r}
ci = readRDS(here("results", "ci.rds"))
```

```{r}
ci = ci[measure %in% c("zero_one", "se")]
ci[let(
  task = as.factor(task),
  learner = as.factor(learner),
  measure = as.factor(measure),
  method = as.factor(method),
  iters = NULL,
  measure = NULL,
  
)]
```
